description: Find errors, extract date, count per date, sort by count.
hint: Chain: grep error | cut -d',' -f2 | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn

description: Extract dept and salary, group by dept with total count.
Find running apps on server1, extract app and memory.
hint: Chain: grep server1 | grep running | cut -d',' -f1,4

description: Find successful requests (200), extract endpoint, count unique.
hint: Chain: grep 200 | cut -d' ' -f2 | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn

description: Find active nodes, extract cluster, count per cluster.
hint: Chain: grep active | cut -d',' -f2 | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn

description: Find product_a orders, extract customer, count orders per customer.
hint: Chain: grep product_a | cut -d',' -f2 | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn

description: Find ERROR and WARN lines, extract first word, count by type.
hint: Chain: grep -E 'ERROR|WARN' | cut -d' ' -f1 | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn

description: Find .txt files, extract name and size, sort by size descending, show top 2.
Find running Linux VMs, extract name and memory, sort by name.
hint: Chain: grep running | grep linux | cut -d',' -f1,4 | sort

description: Find Alice's incomplete tasks (not done), extract task and status.
hint: Chain: grep alice | grep -v done | cut -d',' -f1,3

description: Find active web servers in 192.168 network, extract IP and port.
hint: Chain: grep '^192' | grep web | grep active | cut -d',' -f1,4

description: Count login events per user, sorted by count.
hint: Chain: grep login | cut -d' ' -f3 | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn

description: Find active APIs, extract name and calls, sort by calls descending, show top 2.
hint: Chain: grep active | cut -d',' -f1,4 | sort -t',' -k2 -rn | head -2
